subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: A company run by the former Dallas Mavericks owner Ross Perot Jr. is suing the club and Mark Cuban’s company that holds majority ownership, alleging it is insolvent or verging on insolvency.
snippet: A company run by the former Dallas Mavericks owner Ross Perot Jr. is suing the club and Mark Cuban’s company that holds majority ownership, alleging it is insolvent or verging on insolvency.
